title: Vase, ca. 1912–15
markings: Incised on bottom, underglaze: vertical FULPER, with imprinted vertical FULPER in cartouche over it. Traces of paper label.
provenance:
Jordan-Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman
creditline: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
description:
Large cream & ochre drip glaze vase.
Buff stoneware body, cast. Ovoid body with slightly incurving rim; flat foot. Cream and pale blue-gray striations in a drip glaze effect with olive green colors at rim, covering upper two thirds of body. Bottom third is Fulper's "mustard" mat glaze. Crystalline effects in glaze near rim. Drip effects on interior of body, from rim. Bottom glazed with mustard mat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1912–15.
ca. 1912–15. Glazed stoneware. Gift of Marcia and William Goodman. 1984-84-45.
